rankdata.description: Die casting is the ideal choice for any complex project which requires high accuracy and comes with a low margin of error. On the other hand, sand casting provides far more flexibility with size and is the perfect choice for large parts. The biggest advantage however is not its flexibility and low cost but rather sand casting is alloy friendly and can be used with any type mostly without complications.
